name: Trial #763 - Ludum Dare 44 (Theme: “Your life is currency”)
name_original: Trial #763 - Ludum Dare 44 (Theme: “Your life is currency”)
description:
Help Trial #763 (T763) reach the end of the course!

Energy is everything. It powers abilities, and it is drained when T763 is hit.

Controls:   MOVE - [A], [D]   JUMP/ROCKET - [Space] or [W]   BACK BOOSTER - [Left Shift]   AIM - Mouse   FIRE - [Left Click]
